title.rendered: Aer Lingus Airlines Offers London to Edinburgh 1 Week Package

content.rendered:
Aer Lingus

Aer Lingus (Airlines) was established in 15 April 1936, commenced operations in 27 May 1936. Aer Lingus is the flag carrier airline of Ireland and the second-largest airline in Ireland. Founded by the Irish government, it was privatised between 2006 and 2015 and it is now a subsidiary of International Airlines Group (IAG), the parent company of British Airways, Iberia and Vueling.

Aer Lingus Airlines Offers

Travel from London to Edinburgh on this 6- or 8-night journey.

Includes

  • Round-trip economy class airfare into London (LHR) and returning from Edinburgh (EDI)
  • One way rail ticket from London to Edinburgh

Itinerary & Places to Visit

  • 3 nights in London at The Caesar Hotel or similar
  • 3 nights in Edinburgh at the Jurys Inn or similar
  • 24 Hour Hop-On/Hop-Off Bus Pass in Edinburgh
  • See London by Night Tour
  • Standard Encore Theater Passport
  • Breakfast Daily

For More Details Contact

Telephone – 800-495-1632

View Deal Here
